title: 11. Aw van Lalpa chu rawn fak ru
lyrics:
Doh is C
Aw, van Lalpa chu rawn fak r'u,
In lawm hla nen chawimawi r'u;
Tlan chhuah, ngaihdam leh chhandamte,
Lawmin a hma i kun ang.

Fak r'u, fak r'u, fak r'u,
Fak r'u, chatuan Lalpa chu.

Fak r'u, a khawngaihna vang hian,
Leh kan chunga a thatna;
Kan fel lohnate dawh theiin,
Kumkhuain mal min sawm a.

Fak r'u, fak r'u, fak r'u,
A ngilneih a ropui em!

Kan chak lohnate hi hriain,
Pa angin min enkawl fo;
A angchhungah chuan min humin,
Kan dote min hnehsak thin.

Fak r'u, fak r'u, fak r'u,
A thatna a thuk em e!

Nangni vantirhkohte pawhin,
A chawimawiah min pui r'u;
Ni leh thla, a hmaa kunin,
Thil siam tinreng lo au r'u.

Fak r'u, fak r'u, fak r'u,
Khawngaiha khat kan Pathian.
